sentences.en: A medium dose produces severe nausea within hours.
sentences.cn: 中等剂量几小时之内会引发严重的恶心。

sentences.en: a radio set with medium and short wavebands
sentences.cn: 中短波段收音机

sentences.en: Advertising is a powerful medium.
sentences.cn: 广告是具有强大影响力的传播媒介。

sentences.en: Andrea has medium brown hair, grey eyes and very pale skin.
sentences.cn: 安德烈娅有着深浅适中的棕发、灰色的眼睛和十分白皙的皮肤。

sentences.en: Bruce Willis says he has been talking to his dead brother through a medium.
sentences.cn: 布鲁斯·威利斯说他一直在通过一位灵媒和他死去的兄弟交谈。

sentences.en: But Artaud was increasingly dissatisfied with film as a medium.
sentences.cn: 但是阿尔托对电影这种表现方式越来越不满。

sentences.en: Choose a soft, medium or firm mattress to suit their individual needs.
sentences.cn: 针对他们各人不同的需要挑选柔软、软硬适中或者坚硬的床垫。

sentences.en: Cook under a medium-hot grill.
sentences.cn: 在热度适中的烤架下烹制。

sentences.en: Copper is a good medium for the conduction of heat and electricity.
sentences.cn: 铜是热和电的良导体.

sentences.en: Fry the onions over a medium heat until they are golden.
sentences.cn: 用中火把洋葱炸到金黄色。

sentences.en: hair of medium length
sentences.cn: 中等长短的头发

sentences.en: I would class my garden as medium in size.
sentences.cn: 我的花园只能算是中等大小。

sentences.en: In the medium term the UK car industry has a brighter outlook.
sentences.cn: 从中期来看，英国汽车行业前景将会更好。

sentences.en: Mitchell is well built, of medium height, with a dark complexion.
sentences.cn: 米切尔体格健壮，中等个头，肤色黝黑。

sentences.en: Sift the flour and baking powder into a medium-sized mixing bowl.
sentences.cn: 将面粉和发酵粉筛入中等大小的搅拌碗中。

sentences.en: The medium-term economic prospects remained poor.
sentences.cn: 中期经济前景仍然黯淡。

sentences.en: the novel as a medium for satire
sentences.cn: 作为一种讽刺手段的小说

sentences.en: the visual media
sentences.cn: 视觉媒介

sentences.en: The wine has a medium-bodied, supple flavour.
sentences.cn: 该葡萄酒味道不浓不淡，口感醇滑。

sentences.en: Water is the natural medium in which most fish live.
sentences.cn: 水是鱼类生活的自然环境.

sentences.en: What size shirt does he wear – small, medium or large?
sentences.cn: 他穿多大尺码的衬衫——小号、中号还是大号？

sentences.en: With a nice dark colour, the wine is medium to full bodied.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒色泽深暗悦目，是中等浓郁至浓香型的。

phrases.tran_cn: 培养基（培养微生物的养料）
平均比例尺；中等规模（的）；中间尺度

trans.tran_cn: 中等的，中间的，不深不浅的
trans.tran_en: of middle size, level, or amount

trans.tran_cn: 方式，媒介，巫师，材料，介质
trans.tran_en: a way of communicating information and news to people, such as newspapers, television etc
